Method Detail

getRes

public long[] getRes()
Returns an array representing town resources. 0 - Metal 1 - Timber 2 - Manufactured Materials 3 - Food 4 - Town Civilian Population

setLord

getLord

public int getLord()
If this town is under the influence of another player, this function will return that player's pid. If the player who owns this town is a vassal of a player(The lord), this town will only return the pid of the lord if the lord actually has influence over the town, and doesn't just have tax control over it because of player-level vassalage.(ie, if you own 10 towns, and are a vassal to a player because he has influence over 6 of them. The other 4 towns would have 0 as the pid of the lord, because they are not influenced, but are still taxed under the vassalage pact.) Returns 0 if the town has no lord.

Returns:
